name: 30 Jumps
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 23rd GM48 jam! 

Welcome to 30 Jumps!  The goal is to slingshot drag and release the player through the platforms to try to get to the top!

Please check it out on the contest page and vote! 

https://gm48.net/game/610/30-jumps

Controls:

Mouse left click, drag and aim to try to reach the next platform. 

Arrow keys to pan the camera around (resets to player automatically)

R key to restart
